title: When you change the config for a collection, all nodes in the collection should reload their SolrCore.
description: This will make it much easier to make configuration updates.

comments.author: Hoss Man
comments.content: bulk fixing the version info for 4.0-ALPHA and 4.0 all affected issues have "hoss20120711-bulk-40-change" in comment

comments.author: Cao Manh Dat
comments.content: I believed it is fixed by SOLR-5200 ( and its sub ticket ). Right now, when a solr core is created, it will watch for the /configs/<collection-name> and call reload on that core if any changes happen on the config.

comments.author: Cassandra Targett
comments.content: Not exactly a duplicate of SOLR-5200, but that's the closest resolution to the idea that this is superceded by that issue.
